body_html:
@zou3519 the problem is here

Specifically, the super(Parameter, self) seems to cause infinite recursion with dill.

This was introduced in #8633 as per comment by @SsnL .

I'd be happy to fix it, but I have no idea how? I assume that just using

return Parameter, (self.data, self.requires_grad)

won't work? Would be curious to know, why.

Edit: yeah, I think this should actually work?
body_text:
@zou3519 the problem is here
Specifically, the super(Parameter, self) seems to cause infinite recursion with dill.
This was introduced in #8633 as per comment by @SsnL .
I'd be happy to fix it, but I have no idea how? I assume that just using

Edit: yeah, I think this should actually work?
body:
@zou3519 the problem is [here](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/nn/parameter.py#L30)

Specifically, the `super(Parameter, self)` seems to cause infinite recursion with `dill`. 

This was introduced in https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/8633 as per [comment](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/8633#discussion_r196269752) by @SsnL .

I'd be happy to fix it, but I have no idea how? I assume that just using 
```python
return Parameter, (self.data, self.requires_grad)
```
won't work? Would be curious to know, why.

Edit: yeah, I think this should actually work?
